[ARG0: A White House official] derisively dismissed John McCain 's opposition to President Donald Trump 's CIA nominee in a closed - door staff meeting Thursday by [V: saying] [ARG1: that the senator from Arizona battling brain cancer is " dying anyway] , " according to another White House official with knowledge of the comment .
